title: sona words.toml file
description: General info on a Toki Pona word

author_verbatim.description: The author's original definition, taken verbatim in their words

author_verbatim_source.description: Where the author's original definition is located (usually Discord)

book.description: Which official Toki Pona book was this word featured in, if any.

coined_era.description: When this word was coined (relative to the publication dates of the official Toki Pona books)

coined_year.description: The exact year when this word was coined (if known)

creator.description: The person who created this word (if known)

ku_data.description: The usage data of the word as described in ku (the official Toki Pona dictionary), formatted as a map between a meaning and its frequency index (0 to 5)

sitelen_emosi.description: The sitelen emosi representation of this word, a script for writing Toki Pona using emoji

sitelen_pona.description: A list of sitelen Lasina representations of this word, to be converted into sitelen pona glyphs

sitelen_sitelen.description: A URL pointing to an image of this word's sitelen sitelen hieroglyphic block

source_language.description: The language this word originated from

usage_category.description: The word's usage category, according to a survey performed by the Linku Project

word.description: The word's actual text, in case of a word with multiple definitions

audio.description: Audio files of the words pronounced out loud

jan_lakuse.description: jan Lakuse's pronounciation of the word, made for jan Sonja's Memrise course: https://archive.org/details/toki-pona-audio-by-jan-lakuse

kala_asi.description: kala Asi's pronounciation of the word, made for the Linku Project

luka_pona.description: Video clips of the word being signed in Luka Pona, a Toki Pona sign language

mp4.description: The video clip in MP4 format

gif.description: The video clip as a GIF

pu_verbatim.description: The original definition of the word, as described in the book The Language Of Good (pu). May be inaccurate or outdated

en.description: The original definition in the English version of pu

fr.description: The original definition in the French version of pu

de.description: The original definition in the German version of pu

eo.description: The original definition in the Esperanto version of pu

recognition.description: The percentage of people in the Toki Pona community who recognize this word, according to surveys performed by the Linku Project
